trans-unit.source: A flow content element that defines a cell of content within a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Table"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 定义中的内容的单元格的流内容元素<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Table"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The TableCell element is the only table element that directly hosts content.
trans-unit.target: TableCell 元素是唯一的表元素直接承载内容。

trans-unit.source: Other table elements (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Table>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumn>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup>, and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRow>) exist to define the structural attributes of a table.
trans-unit.target: 其他表元素 (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Table>， <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumn>， <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup>，和<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRow>) 存在定义的表的结构化属性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRow> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Table>

trans-unit.source: TableCell elements may host one or more flow content elements deriving from <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Block>.
trans-unit.target: TableCell 元素只能承载一个或多个流内容元素从<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Block>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Block>派生

trans-unit.source: Valid content elements for a TableCell include: - <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer> - <xref:System.Windows.Documents.List> - <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph> - <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Section> - <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Table> The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCellCollection> collection class provides facilities for working with collections of TableCell objects.
trans-unit.target: 有效的 TableCell 内容元素包括:- <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer>- <xref:System.Windows.Documents.List>- <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph>- <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Section>-<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Table><xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCellCollection>集合类提供用于使用 TableCell 对象的集合的工具。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCellCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Table> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Section> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.List> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > There is no built in data binding for the contents of a TableCell.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> TableCell 的内容的绑定没有内置的数据。

trans-unit.source: The simplest option for adding data binding functionality to a TableCell is to put a data bound <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> in your TableCell like this: `<TableCell><InlineUIContainer><TextBlock Text="{Binding ...}" /></InlineUIContainer></TableCell>`
trans-unit.target: 用于将数据绑定功能添加到 TableCell 最简单的选项是将绑定数据<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>中你 TableCell 如下︰ `<TableCell><InlineUIContainer><TextBlock Text="{Binding ...}" /></InlineUIContainer></TableCell>` </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new, empty instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableCell"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化一个新的空实例<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableCell"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableCell"></xref> class, taking a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Block"></xref> object as the initial contents of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableCell"></xref>类，将指定<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Block"></xref>对象作为新的初始内容<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableCell"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Block"></xref> object specifying the initial contents of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Block"> </xref>对象，它指定新的初始内容<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableCell"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.BlockCollection"></xref> containing the top-level <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Block"></xref> elements that comprise the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.BlockCollection"></xref>包含顶级<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Block"></xref>所包含的内容的元素<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableCell"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockCollection> returned by this property to enumerate or manipulate the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell> element.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockCollection>此属性来枚举或操作的内容返回<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell>元素。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.BlockCollection"></xref> containing the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Block"></xref> elements that comprise the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableCell"></xref> This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.BlockCollection"> </xref>包含<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Block"></xref>所包含的内容的元素<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableCell"></xref>此属性没有任何默认值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> to use when painting the element's border.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref>绘制了元素边框时使用。

trans-unit.source: For a table of swatches that show the available pre-defined brush colors, see <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes>.
trans-unit.target: 显示可用的预定义的画笔颜色样本的表，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`||

trans-unit.source: The brush used to apply to the element's border.
trans-unit.target: 用于将应用于元素的边框的画笔。

trans-unit.source: The default value is a **null** brush.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是**null**画笔。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell.BorderBrush*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell.BorderBrush*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell.BorderBrush*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border thickness for the element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置元素的边框粗细。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - - or - ``` ## XAML Values *uniformThickness* String representation of a single value to apply uniformly to all four thickness dimensions.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 属性用法``` - or - - or - - or - ``` # # XAML 值*uniformThickness*的单个字符串表示形式要统一应用于所有四个宽度尺寸值。

trans-unit.source: For example, a value of `"10"` is equivalent to a value of `"10,10,10,10"`.
An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: 未限定的值，以设备无关的像素为单位。

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: 字符串不需要显式包括位小数。

trans-unit.source: *independentThickness* String representation of four ordered <xref:System.Double> values corresponding to independent thickness dimensions for left, top, right, and bottom, in this order.
trans-unit.target: *independentThickness*四个有序的字符串表示形式<xref:System.Double>值对应于左侧、 顶部、 的独立粗细维度右键，和下，按此顺序。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The four values must be separated with commas; spaces are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 必须用逗号; 分隔的四个值不允许有空格。

trans-unit.source: For example, "5,10,15,20" results in 5 pixels of border to the left of content, 10 pixels of border above content, 15 pixels of border to the right of content, and 20 pixels of border below the content.
trans-unit.target: 例如，"5,10,15,20"生成的 5 个像素的边框左侧的内容、 10 个像素的内容的顶部边框、 15 像素的内容，右侧的边框和 20 像素的以下内容的边框。

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedUniformThickness* A value described by *uniformThickness* followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`.
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedUniformThickness*所描述的值*uniformThickness*后跟一个以下单元说明符︰ `px`， `in`。

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` is inches; 1in==96px For example, `"1in"` provides uniform border of 1 inch in all directions.
trans-unit.target: `px`（默认值） 是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]`in`为英寸; 1 英寸例如，= = 96px`"1in"`提供统一边框四周的 1 英寸。

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedIndependentThickness* A value described by *independentThickness*, with each independent value followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`.
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedIndependentThickness*所描述的值*independentThickness*后, 跟一个以下单元说明符每个独立值︰ `px`， `in`。

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` is inches; 1in==96px For example, `"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`.
trans-unit.target: `px`（默认值） 是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]`in`为英寸; 1 英寸例如，= = 96px `"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`。

trans-unit.source: Unit specifiers may be mixed or omitted from one or more values.
trans-unit.target: 可能混合或者一个或多个值中省略单元说明符。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`||

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Thickness"></xref> structure specifying the amount of border to apply, in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Thickness"> </xref>结构，它指定要应用，以设备独立像素为单位的边框量。

trans-unit.source: The default value is a uniform thickness of zero (**0.0**).
trans-unit.target: 默认值为统一粗细，即零 (**0.0**)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell.BorderThickness*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell.BorderThickness*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell.BorderThickness*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of columns that the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableCell"></xref> should span.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置列数<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableCell"></xref>应跨越。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`||

trans-unit.source: The number of columns the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableCell"></xref> should span.
trans-unit.target: 列数<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableCell"></xref>应跨越。

trans-unit.source: The default value is **1** (no spanning).
trans-unit.target: 默认值是**1** （不跨越）。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell.ColumnSpan*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell.ColumnSpan*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell.ColumnSpan*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the relative direction for flow of content within a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableCell"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定流中的内容的相对方向<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableCell"></xref>元素。

trans-unit.source: The flow direction of content typically corresponds to the innate flow direction of the language being represented.
trans-unit.target: 内容的流动方向通常对应于所表示语言的固有流动方向。

trans-unit.source: Hebrew and Arabic provide examples of languages that naturally flow from right-to-left.
trans-unit.target: 希伯来语和阿拉伯语提供从右到左流动的语言的示例。

trans-unit.source: English, German, and Russian provide examples of languages that naturally flow from left-to-right.
trans-unit.target: 英语、 德语和俄语提供自然流从左到右的语言的示例。

trans-unit.source: **Note:** The value of this property is not automatically changed to match the language used by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: **注意︰**此属性的值不会自动更改以匹配由操作系统使用的语言。

trans-unit.source: If you need to use a different value then the default of <xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection>, you must specify it yourself.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要使用不同的值，则默认的<xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection>，您必须亲自指定。</xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|、 |

trans-unit.source: A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.FlowDirection"></xref> enumeration specifying the relative flow direction.
trans-unit.target: 成员<xref href="System.Windows.FlowDirection"></xref>指定相对流方向的枚举。

trans-unit.source: Getting this property returns the currently effective flow direction.
trans-unit.target: 获取此属性将返回当前有效的流动方向。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property causes the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableCell"></xref> element to re-flow in the indicated direction.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性将导致的内容<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableCell"></xref>元素重新在指示的方向流动。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.FlowDirection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.FlowDirection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell.FlowDirection*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell.FlowDirection*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell.FlowDirection*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of each line of content.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置各行内容的高度。

trans-unit.source: Changing this value does not change the height of the associated text; rather, it changes the height of the line that contains the text.
trans-unit.target: 更改此值不会更改关联的文本; 的高度相反，它将更改包含文本行的高度。

trans-unit.source: In addition to this property, the layout of lines in a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell> is affected by its <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell.LineStackingStrategy%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 除了此属性中的行的布局<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell>受其<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell.LineStackingStrategy%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell.LineStackingStrategy%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - ``` ## XAML Values *double* String representation of a value equal to or greater than `0.0034` and equal to or less then `160000`.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 属性用法``` - or - - or - ``` # # XAML 值*double* 的字符串表示形式值等于或大于`0.0034`且等于或小于`160000`。

trans-unit.source: An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: 未限定的值，以设备无关的像素为单位。

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: 字符串不需要显式包括位小数。

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble* A *double* value as described above, (excepting `Auto`) followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble* A *double*值，上文所述 (除外`Auto`) 后跟一个以下单元说明符︰ `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px Auto Causes the line height to be determined automatically from the current font characteristics.
trans-unit.target: `px`（默认值） 是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]`in`为英寸; 1 英寸 = = 96px`cm`是厘米; 1cm==(96/2.54) px`pt`是点; 1pt==(96/72) px 自动使行高度由当前字体特征自动确定。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to a property value of <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
trans-unit.target: 等效于<xref:System.Double.NaN>.</xref:System.Double.NaN>属性值

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, , |
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`| 、 |

trans-unit.source: A double value specifying the height of line in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: 双精度值，以设备独立像素为单位指定行的高度。

trans-unit.source: LineHeight must be equal to or greater than `0.0034` and equal to or less then `160000`.
trans-unit.target: LineHeight 必须等于或大于`0.0034`且等于或小于`160000`。

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Double> (equivalent to an attribute value of "`Auto`") causes the line height to be determined automatically from the current font characteristics.
trans-unit.target: 值为<xref:System.Double>(等效于特性值的"`Auto`") 使行高度由当前字体特征自动确定。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.Double>。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Raised if an attempt is made to set <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock.LineHeight*> to a non-positive value.
trans-unit.target: 如果尝试设置引发<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock.LineHeight*>为非正值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock.LineHeight*>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell.LineHeight*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell.LineHeight*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell.LineHeight*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the mechanism by which a line box is determined for each line of text within the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置依据确定行框的文本中的每行的机制<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableCell"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, , |
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`| 、 |

trans-unit.source: The mechanism by which a line box is determined for each line of text within the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 依据确定行框的文本中的每行的机制<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableCell"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.LineStackingStrategy"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.LineStackingStrategy"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell.LineStackingStrategy*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell.LineStackingStrategy*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell.LineStackingStrategy*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>对象的<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableCell"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将替代<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableCell"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the padding thickness for the element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置元素的填充厚度。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - - or - ``` ## XAML Values *uniformThickness* String representation of a single value to apply uniformly to all four thickness dimensions.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 属性用法``` - or - - or - - or - ``` # # XAML 值*uniformThickness*的单个字符串表示形式要统一应用于所有四个宽度尺寸值。

trans-unit.source: For example, a value of `"10"` is equivalent to a value of `"10,10,10,10"`.
An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: 未限定的值，以设备无关的像素为单位。

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: 字符串不需要显式包括位小数。

trans-unit.source: *independentThickness* String representation of four ordered <xref:System.Double> values corresponding to independent thickness dimensions for left, top, right, and bottom, in this order.
trans-unit.target: *independentThickness*四个有序的字符串表示形式<xref:System.Double>值对应于左侧、 顶部、 的独立粗细维度右键，和下，按此顺序。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The four values must be separated with commas; spaces are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 必须用逗号; 分隔的四个值不允许有空格。

trans-unit.source: For example, "5,10,15,20" results in 5 pixels of padding to the left of content, 10 pixels of padding above content, 15 pixels of padding to the right of content, and 20 pixels of padding below the content.
trans-unit.target: 例如，"5,10,15,20"生成的 5 个像素的填充左侧的内容、 内容上方的填充的 10 个像素、 15 像素的内容，右侧的填充和 20 像素的以下内容的填充。

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedUniformThickness* A value described by *uniformThickness* followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`.
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedUniformThickness*所描述的值*uniformThickness*后跟一个以下单元说明符︰ `px`， `in`。

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` is inches; 1in==96px For example, `"1in"` provides uniform padding of 1 inch in all directions.
trans-unit.target: `px`（默认值） 是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]`in`为英寸; 1 英寸例如，= = 96px`"1in"`提供的所有方向 1 英寸的统一填充。

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedIndependentThickness* A value described by *independentThickness*, with each independent value followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`.
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedIndependentThickness*所描述的值*independentThickness*后, 跟一个以下单元说明符每个独立值︰ `px`， `in`。

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` is inches; 1in==96px For example, `"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`.
trans-unit.target: `px`（默认值） 是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]`in`为英寸; 1 英寸例如，= = 96px `"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`。

trans-unit.source: Unit specifiers may be mixed or omitted from one or more values.
trans-unit.target: 可能混合或者一个或多个值中省略单元说明符。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`||

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Thickness"></xref> structure specifying the amount of padding to apply, in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Thickness"> </xref>结构，它指定要应用，以设备独立像素为单位的填充量。

trans-unit.source: The default value is a uniform thickness of zero (**0.0**).
trans-unit.target: 默认值为统一粗细，即零 (**0.0**)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell.Padding*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell.Padding*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell.Padding*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of rows that the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableCell"></xref> should span.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的行数<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableCell"></xref>应跨越。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`||

trans-unit.source: The number of rows the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableCell"></xref> should span.
trans-unit.target: 行数<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableCell"></xref>应跨越。

trans-unit.source: The default value is **1** (no spanning).
trans-unit.target: 默认值是**1** （不跨越）。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell.RowSpan*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell.RowSpan*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell.RowSpan*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates the horizontal alignment of text content.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示文本内容的水平对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, , |
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`| 、 |

trans-unit.source: A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.TextAlignment"></xref> enumerations specifying the desired alignment.
trans-unit.target: 成员<xref href="System.Windows.TextAlignment"></xref>枚举指定所需的对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.TextAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.TextAlignment"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell.TextAlignment*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell.TextAlignment*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell.TextAlignment*>
